## Source: amazon-inspector (d9156cfe8712328dc4de944c470b2da3184bc49c1c444febc9eccf20f1fd962f)
The package cc-raiesy was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (1f5952f5f09794bf5f5b6cd4c41299aec2f6df42b0628c9706419f2659e51316)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'cc-raiesy' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
